cache_inode_lookup.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00087 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00088 #include "config.h"

00091 #include "LRU_List.h"
00092 #include "log_functions.h"
00093 #include "HashData.h"
00094 #include "HashTable.h"
00095 #include "fsal.h"
00096 #include "cache_inode.h"
00097 #include "stuff_alloc.h"

00099 #include <unistd.h>
00100 #include <sys/types.h>
00101 #include <sys/param.h>
00102 #include <time.h>
00103 #include <pthread.h>
00104 
00124 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_lookup_sw( cache_entry_t        * pentry_parent,
00125                                        fsal_name_t          * pname, 
00126                                        fsal_attrib_list_t   * pattr, 
00127                                        hash_table_t         * ht,  
00128                                        cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00129                                        fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext, 
00130                                        cache_inode_status_t * pstatus,
00131                                        int                    use_mutex )
00132 {
00133   cache_entry_t         * pdir_chain = NULL ;
00134   cache_entry_t         * pentry = NULL ;
00135   fsal_status_t           fsal_status ;
00136   fsal_handle_t           object_handle ;
00137   fsal_handle_t           dir_handle ;
00138   fsal_attrib_list_t      object_attributes ;
00139   cache_inode_status_t    status ;
00140   cache_inode_create_arg_t create_arg;
00141   cache_inode_file_type_t type ;
00142   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status ;
00143   
00144 
00145   cache_inode_fsal_data_t  new_entry_fsdata ;
00146   int i = 0 ;
00147 
00148   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00149   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00150 
00151   /* stats */
00152   pclient->stat.nb_call_total += 1 ;
00153   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00154 
00155 
00156   /* Get lock on the pentry */
00157   if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00158     P( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00159   
00160   if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type != DIR_BEGINNING &&
00161       pentry_parent->internal_md.type != DIR_CONTINUE )
00162     {
00163       /* Parent is no directory base, return NULL */
00164       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_NOT_A_DIRECTORY ;
00165 
00166       /* stats */
00167       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00168       
00169       if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00170         V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00171 
00172       return NULL ;
00173     }
00174 
00175   /* if name is ".", use the input value */
00176   if( !FSAL_namecmp( pname,  &FSAL_DOT ) )
00177     {
00178       pentry = pentry_parent ;
00179     }
00180   else if( !FSAL_namecmp( pname, &FSAL_DOT_DOT ) )
00181     {
00182       /* Directory do only have exactly one parent. This a limitation in all FS, which 
00183        * implies that hard link are forbidden on directories (so that they exists only in one dir)
00184        * Because of this, the parent list is always limited to one element for a dir.
00185        * Clients SHOULD never 'lookup( .. )' in something that is no dir */
00186       pentry = cache_inode_lookupp_no_mutex( pentry_parent, ht, pclient, pcontext, pstatus ) ;
00187     }
00188   else
00189     {
00190       /* This is a "regular lookup" (not on "." or "..") */
00191       
00192       /* Check is user (as specified by the credentials) is authorized to lookup the directory or not */
00193       if( cache_inode_access_no_mutex( pentry_parent, 
00194                                        FSAL_X_OK,
00195                                        ht,
00196                                        pclient,
00197                                        pcontext,
00198                                        pstatus ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00199         {
00200           if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00201             V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00202           
00203           pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_GETATTR] += 1 ;
00204           return NULL ;
00205         }
00206 
00207       /* Try to look into the dir and its dir_cont. At this point, it must be said than lock on dir_cont are
00208        *  taken when a lock is previously acquired on the related dir_begin */
00209       pdir_chain = pentry_parent ;
00210       
00211       do
00212         {
00213           /* Is this entry known ? */
00214           if( pdir_chain->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00215             {
00216               for( i = 0 ; i < CHILDREN_ARRAY_SIZE ; i++ )
00217                 {
00218                   if( pdir_chain->object.dir_begin.pdir_data->dir_entries[i].active == VALID )
00219                     if( !FSAL_namecmp( pname,  
00220                                        &(pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.pdir_data->dir_entries[i].name) ) )
00221                       {
00222                         /* Entry was found */
00223                         pentry = pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.pdir_data->dir_entries[i].pentry ;
00224                         DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "Cache Hit detected (dir_begin)" ) ;
00225                         break ;
00226                       }    
00227                 }
00228               
00229               /* Do we have to go on browsing the cache_inode ? */
00230               if( pdir_chain->object.dir_begin.end_of_dir == END_OF_DIR ) 
00231                 {
00232                   break ;
00233                 }
00234               
00235               /* Next step */
00236               pdir_chain = pdir_chain->object.dir_begin.pdir_cont ;
00237             }
00238           else
00239             {
00240               /* The element in the dir_chain is a DIR_CONTINUE */
00241               for( i = 0 ; i < CHILDREN_ARRAY_SIZE ; i++ )
00242                 {
00243                   if( pdir_chain->object.dir_cont.pdir_data->dir_entries[i].active == VALID )
00244                     if( !FSAL_namecmp( pname,  
00245                                        &(pdir_chain->object.dir_cont.pdir_data->dir_entries[i].name) ) ) 
00246                       {
00247                         /* Entry was found */
00248                         pentry = pdir_chain->object.dir_cont.pdir_data->dir_entries[i].pentry ;
00249                         DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "Cache Hit detected (dir_cont)" ) ;
00250                         break ;
00251                       }    
00252                 }
00253               
00254               /* Do we have to go on browsing the cache_inode ? */
00255               if( pdir_chain->object.dir_cont.end_of_dir == END_OF_DIR ) 
00256                 {
00257                   break ;
00258                 }
00259 
00260               /* Next step */
00261               pdir_chain = pdir_chain->object.dir_cont.pdir_cont ;
00262             }
00263           
00264         } while( pentry == NULL ) ;
00265       
00266       /* At this point, if pentry == NULL, we are not looking for a known son, query fsal for lookup */
00267       if( pentry == NULL )
00268         {
00269           DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_FULL_DEBUG, "Cache Miss detected" ) ;
00270           
00271           if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_BEGINNING )
00272             dir_handle = pentry_parent->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00273           
00274           if( pentry_parent->internal_md.type == DIR_CONTINUE )
00275             {
00276               if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00277                 P( pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00278               
00279               dir_handle = pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00280               
00281               if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00282                 V( pentry_parent->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00283             }
00284           
00285           object_attributes.asked_attributes = pclient->attrmask ;
00286           fsal_status = FSAL_lookup( &dir_handle, pname, pcontext, &object_handle, &object_attributes ) ;
00287           
00288           if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00289             {
00290               *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00291 
00292               if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00293                 V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00294               
00295               /* Stale File Handle to be detected and managed */
00296               if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE ) 
00297                {
00298                  cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00299 
00300                  DisplayLog( "cache_inode_lookup: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p", pentry_parent ) ;
00301 
00302                  if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry_parent, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) 
00303                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_pentry_parent: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry_parent, kill_status ) ;
00304 
00305                  *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00306                }
00307 
00308               /* stats */
00309               pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00310               
00311               return NULL ;
00312             }
00313           
00314           type = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( object_attributes.type ) ;
00315           
00316           /* If entry is a symlink, this value for be cached */
00317           if( type == SYMBOLIC_LINK )
00318             {
00319               fsal_status = FSAL_readlink( &object_handle, pcontext, &create_arg.link_content, &object_attributes  ) ;
00320               if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00321                 { 
00322                   *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00323                   if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00324                     V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00325                  
00326                    /* Stale File Handle to be detected and managed */
00327                    if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE )
00328                     {
00329                       cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00330 
00331                       DisplayLog( "cache_inode_lookup: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p", pentry_parent ) ;
00332 
00333                       if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry_parent, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00334                          DisplayLog( "cache_inode_pentry_parent: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry_parent, kill_status ) ;
00335 
00336                        *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00337                     }
00338  
00339                   /* stats */
00340                   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00341                   
00342                   return NULL ;
00343                 }
00344             }
00345           
00346           /* Allocation of a new entry in the cache */
00347           new_entry_fsdata.handle = object_handle ;
00348           new_entry_fsdata.cookie = 0 ;
00349           
00350           
00351           if( ( pentry = cache_inode_new_entry( &new_entry_fsdata, 
00352                                                 &object_attributes, 
00353                                                 type, 
00354                                                 &create_arg,
00355                                                 NULL, 
00356                                                 ht, 
00357                                                 pclient, 
00358                                                 pcontext, 
00359                                                 FALSE, /* This is a population and not a creation */
00360                                                 pstatus ) ) == NULL )
00361             {
00362               if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00363                 V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00364               
00365               /* stats */
00366               pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00367               
00368               return NULL ;
00369             }
00370           
00371           /* Link entry to the parent */
00372           pentry->parent_list->parent = pentry_parent ;
00373 
00374           /* Entry was found in the FSAL, add this entry to the parent directory */
00375           cache_status = cache_inode_add_cached_dirent( pentry_parent,
00376                                                         pname, 
00377                                                         pentry,
00378                                                         NULL,
00379                                                         ht, 
00380                                                         pclient, 
00381                                                         pcontext,
00382                                                         pstatus) ;
00383           
00384           if( cache_status != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS && cache_status != CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS )
00385             {
00386               if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00387                 V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00388               
00389               /* stats */
00390               pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00391               
00392               return NULL ;
00393             }
00394           
00395         }
00396     }
00397 
00398   /* Return the attributes */
00399   cache_inode_get_attributes( pentry, pattr ) ;
00400   
00401   
00402   *pstatus =  cache_inode_valid( pentry_parent, CACHE_INODE_OP_GET, pclient ) ;
00403   if( use_mutex == TRUE )
00404     V( pentry_parent->lock ) ;
00405 
00406   /* stat */
00407   if( *pstatus != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00408     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00409   else
00410     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_LOOKUP] += 1 ;
00411   
00412   return pentry ;
00413 } /* cache_inode_lookup_sw */
00414 
00434 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_lookup_no_mutex( cache_entry_t        * pentry_parent,
00435                                              fsal_name_t          * pname, 
00436                                              fsal_attrib_list_t   * pattr, 
00437                                              hash_table_t         * ht,  
00438                                              cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00439                                              fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext, 
00440                                              cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00441 {
00442   return cache_inode_lookup_sw(  pentry_parent,
00443                                  pname, 
00444                                  pattr, 
00445                                  ht,
00446                                  pclient, 
00447                                  pcontext, 
00448                                  pstatus,
00449                                  FALSE ) ;
00450 } /* cache_inode_lookup_no_mutex */

00471 cache_entry_t * cache_inode_lookup( cache_entry_t        * pentry_parent,
00472                                     fsal_name_t          * pname, 
00473                                     fsal_attrib_list_t   * pattr, 
00474                                     hash_table_t         * ht,  
00475                                     cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00476                                     fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext, 
00477                                     cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00478 {
00479   return cache_inode_lookup_sw(  pentry_parent,
00480                                  pname, 
00481                                  pattr, 
00482                                  ht,
00483                                  pclient, 
00484                                  pcontext, 
00485                                  pstatus,
00486                                  TRUE ) ;
00487 } /* cache_inode_lookup */
